game_description: Avatar Physical Touch is an experimental app that brings physical contact to avatar. You can physically touch other avatars. It will bring an unprecedented sense of realism to avatar. You can play with a touch controller or hand tracking. You can import your avatar by logging in to DMM VR Connect.
